charges.charge_description: 21:846=CD.F CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE From in or about September 2013, to the present, in Peoria County and elsewhere, in the CDIL, the defendants, knowingly conspired with persons to distribute a mixture and substance containing a detectible amount of heroin, a Schedule I controlled substance, in violation of 21 U.S.C. §§846, 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(C)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: IT IS ORDERED: Dft committed to the custody of the BOP for 57 months; 6 years Supervised Release; No Fine; $100 Special Assessment

charges.charge_description: 21:846=CD.F CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE On or about the dates of September 2013 to the present in the county of Peoria in the CDIL, the defendants did knowingly conspire to distribute a controlled substance, heroin, a Schedule I controlled substance in violation of 21 U.S.C. §§ 846, 841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(C)
